downloadTitle: Bing Maps AJAX Upgrade for Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013 Service Pack 1
downloadDescription: Microsoft has released Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013 Service Pack 1 (on-premises) Bing Maps AJAX upgrade. This is a tested update for Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013 Service Pack 1.
detailsSection:
Microsoft has released Bing Maps AJAX upgrade for Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013 Service Pack 1 Server. This update replaces the Bing Maps AJAX Control Version 7, which has reached its end-of-life. To continue to use Bing Maps with Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013 Service Pack 1, you must apply this update. For more information about this release, see Microsoft Knowledge Base article 4038205:
Bing Maps AJAX Upgrade for Microsoft Dynamics 2013 CRM Service Pack 1
systemRequirementsSection:
Prerequisites:
  • This update must be installed on a computer that is running Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013 Service Pack 1 Server (on-premises).
installInstructionSection:
Click Download, and then select the file you want to download from the list.

To install this update, do one of the following:
  • To start the installation immediately, click Run.
  • To save the download to your computer for installation later, click Save.
  • To cancel the download, click Cancel.
additionalInformationSection:
Hotfixes and updates that you have to manually enable or configure

This Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013 Service Pack 1 update may contain hotfixes and updates that have to be manually enabled or configured. To enable or configure these hotfixes on the server that is running Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013 Service Pack 1, see the "Hotfixes and updates that you must enable or configure manually" section of the following Microsoft Knowledge Base article:
Bing Maps AJAX Upgrade for Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2013 Service Pack 1

relatedResourcesSection.title: manage Bing Maps for your organization
